synopsis.text: Kakaka, Tototo, and their primitive son, Dokachin, find themselves thrust into the bustling world of 1960's Japan when a time machine experiment goes awry, teleporting them and a piece of their land into the future. As the Dokachin family grapples with the unfamiliar sights and sounds of their new surroundings, they inadvertently wreak havoc with their stone axes, sparking a series of chaotic misadventures. Each episode of this comedic anime features two stories centered around the family's attempts to adapt to modern life while leaving their own unique mark on the neighborhood.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
